SummaryEnglish: In 2029, with the advance of Cyborg technology, the human body can be "augmented" or even completely replaced with cybernetic parts. Another significant achievement is the World of Ghost in the Shell#Cyberbrains, a mechanical casing for the human brain that allows access to the Internet and other networks. An often-mentioned term is "ghost", referring to the consciousness inhabiting the body (the "shell").
